name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Craig B. SOKOLOW, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Sokolow

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Craig B. SOKOLOW, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of April, 1997, there having been filed with this Court by Craig B. Sokolow his verified Statement of Resignation dated March 12, 1997, stating that he desires to resign from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E., it is
ORDERED that the resignation of Craig B. Sokolow be and it is hereby accepted and he is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and it is further ORDERED that he shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 195
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Craig B. SOKOLOW, Respondent.
No. 133 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 24, 1997.
